post_message: Sarah Palin is lashing out against ‘radical liberals in media’ and their portrayal of the family behind the popular TV show “19 Kids in Counting,” after reports of Josh Duggar's sexual misconduct surfaced.  Palin said there was a double standard, stating actress Lena Dunham did not receive the same backlash after she revealed in her book that, as a child, she used ‘anything a sexual predator might do’ to bribe her young sister for kisses and more.   Palin began her rant on Facebook in all caps, writing "HEY LENA, WHY NOT LAUGH OFF EVERYONE'S SEXUAL "EXPERIMENTS" AS YOU HAUGHTILY ENJOY REWARDS FOR YOUR OWN PERVERSION? YOU PEDOPHILE, YOU.”
